title: my hextech annie gemstone disappeared...
body:
can you check please?
why did it disappear?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I asked a Rioter to take a look into this for you, you've received a reply in your other thread [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/BITfn62j-my-hextech-annie-gemstone-is-disappeareddo-you-know-why?comment=000000000000).
